Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Esophageal Diseases/Deglutition Disorders
Record.Description: Difficulty in SWALLOWING which may result from neuromuscular disorder or mechanical obstruction. Dysphagia is classified into two distinct types: oropharyngeal dysphagia due to malfunction of the PHARYNX and UPPER ESOPHAGEAL SPHINCTER; and esophageal dysphagia due to malfunction of the ESOPHAGUS.
